1: וַֽיִּקְרְב֞וּ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>came near</n> רָאשֵׁ֣י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>And the chief</n> הָֽאָב֗וֹת <sup>1 </sup> <n>fathers</n> לְמִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>of the families</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> גִלְעָד֙ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> מָכִ֣יר <sup>4353 </sup> <n>of Machir</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>of Manasseh</n> מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>of the families</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph</n> וַֽיְדַבְּר֞וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and spake</n> לִפְנֵ֤י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> מֹשֶׁה֙ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>Moses</n> וְלִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>and before</n> הַנְּשִׂאִ֔ים <sup>5387 </sup> <n>the princes</n> רָאשֵׁ֥י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>the chief</n> אָב֖וֹת <sup>1 </sup> <n>fathers</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
2: וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲדֹנִי֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>my lord</n> צִוָּ֣ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> לָתֵ֨ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֧רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> בְּנַחֲלָ֛ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>for an inheritance</n> בְּגוֹרָ֖ל <sup>1486 </sup> <n>by lot</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַֽאדֹנִי֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>and my lord</n> צֻוָּ֣ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>was commanded</n> בַֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>by the LORD</n> לָתֵ֗ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַחֲלַ֛ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>the inheritance</n> צְלָפְחָ֥ד <sup>6765 </sup> <n>of Zelophehad</n> אָחִ֖ינוּ <sup>251 </sup> <n>our brother</n> לִבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>unto his daughters</n>
3: וְ֠הָיוּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>belong</n> לְאֶחָ֞ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>to any</n> מִבְּנֵ֨י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> שִׁבְטֵ֥י <sup>7626 </sup> <n>of the [other] tribes</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְנָשִׁים֒ <sup>802 </sup> <n>And if they be married</n> וְנִגְרְעָ֤ה <sup>1639 </sup> <n>be taken</n> נַחֲלָתָן֙ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>then shall their inheritance</n> מִנַּחֲלַ֣ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>from the inheritance</n> אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of our fathers</n> וְנוֹסַ֕ף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>and shall be put</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> נַחֲלַ֣ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>to the inheritance</n> הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribe</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>belong</n> לָהֶ֑ם וּמִגֹּרַ֥ל <sup>1486 </sup> <n>from the lot</n> נַחֲלָתֵ֖נוּ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>of our inheritance</n> יִגָּרֵֽעַ׃ <sup>1639 </sup> <n>whereunto they are received so shall it be taken</n>
4: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>When</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>comes</n> הַיֹּבֵל֮ <sup>3104 </sup> <n>And when the jubile</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְנֽוֹסְפָה֙ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>be put</n> נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <sup>5159 </sup> <n>shall be then shall their inheritance</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> נַחֲלַ֣ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>unto the inheritance</n> הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribe</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>belong</n> לָהֶ֑ם וּמִֽנַּחֲלַת֙ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>whereunto they are received so shall their inheritance</n> מַטֵּ֣ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribe</n> אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of our fathers</n> יִגָּרַ֖ע <sup>1639 </sup> <n>be taken away</n> נַחֲלָתָֽן׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>from the inheritance</n>
5: וַיְצַ֤ו <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> מֹשֶׁה֙ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>And Moses</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>according</n> פִּ֥י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>according to the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> מַטֵּ֥ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>The tribe</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> יוֹסֵ֖ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph</n> דֹּבְרִֽים׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>hath said</n>
6: זֶ֣ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> הַדָּבָ֞ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>This [is] the thing</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוָּ֣ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>doth command</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> לִבְנ֤וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>concerning the daughters</n> צְלָפְחָד֙ <sup>6765 </sup> <n>of Zelophehad</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> לַטּ֥וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>best</n> בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>to whom they think</n> תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְנָשִׁ֑ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>Let them marry</n> אַ֗ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>only</n> לְמִשְׁפַּ֛חַת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>only to the family</n> מַטֵּ֥ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribe</n> אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their father</n> תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall they</n> לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>shall they marry</n>
7: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תִסֹּ֤ב <sup>5437 </sup> <n>remove</n> נַחֲלָה֙ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>So shall not the inheritance</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>from tribe</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מַטֶּ֑ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>to tribe</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>for every one</n> בְּנַחֲלַת֙ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>himself to the inheritance</n> מַטֵּ֣ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribe</n> אֲבֹתָ֔יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his fathers</n> יִדְבְּק֖וּ <sup>1692 </sup> <n>shall keep</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
8: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Every</n> בַּ֞ת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>And every daughter</n> יֹרֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>3423 </sup> <n>that possesseth</n> נַחֲלָ֗ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>an inheritance</n> מִמַּטּוֹת֮ <sup>4294 </sup> <n>in any tribe</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְאֶחָ֗ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>unto one</n> מִמִּשְׁפַּ֛חַת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>of the family</n> מַטֵּ֥ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribe</n> אָבִ֖יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of her father</n> תִּהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>shall be wife</n> לְמַ֗עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>so</n> יִֽירְשׁוּ֙ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>may enjoy</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>that the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> נַחֲלַ֥ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>the inheritance</n> אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his fathers</n>
9: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תִסֹּ֧ב <sup>5437 </sup> <n>remove</n> נַחֲלָ֛ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>Neither shall the inheritance</n> מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>from [one] tribe</n> לְמַטֶּ֣ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>tribe</n> אַחֵ֑ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>to another</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>but every one</n> בְּנַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>himself to his own inheritance</n> יִדְבְּק֕וּ <sup>1692 </sup> <n>shall keep</n> מַטּ֖וֹת <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribes</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
10: כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוָּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>Moses</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> עָשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>so did</n> בְּנ֥וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughters</n> צְלָפְחָֽד׃ <sup>6765 </sup> <n>of Zelophehad</n>
11: וַתִּהְיֶ֜ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מַחְלָ֣ה <sup>4244 </sup> <n>For Mahlah</n> תִרְצָ֗ה <sup>8656 </sup> <n>Tirzah</n> וְחָגְלָ֧ה <sup>2295 </sup> <n>and Hoglah</n> וּמִלְכָּ֛ה <sup>4435 </sup> <n>and Milcah</n> וְנֹעָ֖ה <sup>5270 </sup> <n>and Noah</n> בְּנ֣וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughters</n> צְלָפְחָ֑ד <sup>6765 </sup> <n>of Zelophehad</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>brothers' sons</n> דֹדֵיהֶ֖ן <sup>1730 </sup> <n>unto their father's</n> לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>were married</n>
12: מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֛ת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>into the families</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>of Manasseh</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יוֹסֵ֖ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph</n> הָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>remained</n> לְנָשִׁ֑ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>[And] they were married</n> וַתְּהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>remained</n> נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <sup>5159 </sup> <n>and their inheritance</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> מַטֵּ֖ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>remained in the tribe</n> מִשְׁפַּ֥חַת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>of the family</n> אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their father</n>
13: אֵ֣לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> הַמִּצְוֹ֞ת <sup>4687 </sup> <n>These [are] the commandments</n> וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and the judgments</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> צִוָּ֧ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by the hand</n> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>of Moses</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <sup>6160 </sup> <n>in the plains</n> מוֹאָ֔ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> יַרְדֵּ֥ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>by Jordan</n> יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <sup>3405 </sup> <n>[near] Jericho</n>
